original: Ime kho panāyasmanto terasa saṅghādisesā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: ime kho pana āyasmanto terasa saṅgha adisesāḥ dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: tena samayena buddhaḥ bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā seyyasako anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā seyyasakaḥ an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carati

original: So tena kiso hoti lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
analyzed: so tena kisaḥ hoti lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gatto

original: Addasa kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ kisaṁ lūkhaṁ dubbaṇṇaṁ uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajātaṁ dhamanisanthatagattaṁ. Disvāna āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ etadavoca—
analyzed: addasa kho āyasmā udāyī āyasmantam seyyasakam kisam lūkham dubbaṇṇam uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātam dhamani santhata gatta disvānaḥ āyasmantam seyyasakam etat avoca

original: “kissa tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto?
analyzed: kissa tvaṃ āvuso seyyasaka kisaḥ lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gatto

original: Kacci no tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, anabhirato brahmacariyaṁ carasī”ti?
analyzed: kacci no tvam āvuso seyyasaka an abhirataḥ brahmacariyam carasi iti

original: “Tena hi tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, yāvadatthaṁ bhuñja yāvadatthaṁ supa yāvadatthaṁ nhāya.
analyzed: tena hi tvaḥ āvuso seyyasaka yāvadattham bhuñja yāvadattham supa yāvadattham nhāya

original: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā te anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocehī”ti.
analyzed: yāvadattham bhuñjitvā yāvadattham supitvā yāvadattham nhāyitvā yadā te anabhirati uppajjati rāgaḥ cittam tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocehi iti

original: “Kiṁ nu kho, āvuso, kappati evarūpaṁ kātun”ti?
analyzed: kim nu kho āvuso kappati evarūpam kātunti
āma āvuso aham pi evam karomi iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako yāvadatthaṁ bhuñji yāvadatthaṁ supi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyi.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā seyyasakaḥ yāvadattham bhuñji yāvadattham supi yāvadattham nhāyi

original: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesi.
analyzed: yāvadattham bhuñjitvā yāvadattham supitvā yāvadattham nhāyitvā yadā an abhirati uppajjati rāgaḥ cittam anuddhaseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocesi

original: Atha kho āyasmā seyyasako aparena samayena vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā seyyasakaḥ aparena samayena vaṇṇavā ahosi pīṇi indriyaḥ pasanna mukha vaṇṇaḥ vippasanna chavi vaṇṇaḥ

original: Atha kho āyasmato seyyasakassa sahāyakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ etadavocuṁ—
analyzed: atha kho āyasmataḥ seyyasakassa sahāyakāḥ bhikkhū āyasmantam seyyasakam etat avocuḥ

original: “pubbe kho tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, kiso ahosi lūkho dubbaṇṇo uppaṇḍuppaṇḍukajāto dhamanisanthatagatto.
analyzed: pubbe kho tvaṃ āvuso seyyasaka kisaḥ ahosi lūkhaḥ dubbaṇṇaḥ uppaṇḍu paṇḍuka jātaḥ dhamani santhata gatto

original: So dāni tvaṁ etarahi vaṇṇavā pīṇindriyo pasannamukhavaṇṇo vippasannachavivaṇṇo.
analyzed: saḥ dāni tvam etarahi vaṇṇavā pīṇi indriyaḥ pasanna mukha vaṇṇaḥ vippasanna chavi vaṇṇaḥ

original: Kiṁ nu kho tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, bhesajjaṁ karosī”ti?
analyzed: kim nu khalu tvam āvuso seyyasaka bhesajjam karosi iti
na khalu aha āvuso bhesajjam karomi

original: Api cāhaṁ yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjāmi yāvadatthaṁ supāmi yāvadatthaṁ nhāyāmi.
analyzed: api ca aham yāvadattham bhuñjāmi yāvadattham supāmi yāvadattham nhāyāmi

original: Yāvadatthaṁ bhuñjitvā yāvadatthaṁ supitvā yāvadatthaṁ nhāyitvā yadā me anabhirati uppajjati rāgo cittaṁ anuddhaṁseti tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocemī”ti.
analyzed: yāvadattham bhuñjitvā yāvadattham supitvā yāvadattham nhāyitvā yadā me anabhirati uppajjati rāgaḥ cittam tadā hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocemi iti

original: “Kiṁ pana tvaṁ, āvuso seyyasaka, yeneva hatthena saddhādeyyaṁ bhuñjasi teneva hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
analyzed: kim pana tvam āvuso seyyasaka yena iva hatthena saddhādeyyam bhuñjasi tena iva hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocesi iti

original: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā …pe… te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
analyzed: ye te bhikkhū appicchā pe te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti

original: “kathañhi nāma āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessatī”ti.
analyzed: katham hi nāma āyasmā seyyasakaḥ hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocessati iti

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavato etamatthaṁ ārocesuṁ.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū āyasmantam seyyasakam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā bhagavataḥ etam attham ārocesu

original: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṁ nidāne etasmiṁ pakaraṇe bhikkhusaṅghaṁ sannipātāpetvā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ paṭipucchi—
analyzed: atha kho bhagavā etasmim nidāne etasmim pakaraṇe bhikkhu saṅgham sannipātāpetvā āyasmantam seyyasakam paṭipucchi

original: “saccaṁ kira tvaṁ, seyyasaka, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocesī”ti?
analyzed: saccam kira tva seyyasaka hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocesi iti

original: “ananucchavikaṁ, moghapurisa, ananulomikaṁ appatirūpaṁ assāmaṇakaṁ akappiyaṁ akaraṇīyaṁ.
analyzed: ananucchavika moghapurisa ananulomikam appatirūpam a sāmaṇakam a kappiyam a karaṇīya

original: Kathañhi nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṁ mocessasi.
analyzed: katham hi nāma tva mogha purisa hatthena upakkamitvā asucim mocessasi

original: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sarāgāya,
analyzed: nanu mayā moghapurisa aneka pariyāyena virāgāya dhammo desito no sa rāgāya
vi saññogāya dhammaḥ desitaḥ no saññogāya
anupādānāya dhammo desito no sa aupādānāya

original: Tattha nāma tvaṁ, moghapurisa, mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sarāgāya cetessasi, visaññogāya dhamme desite saññogāya cetessasi, anupādānāya dhamme desite saupādānāya cetessasi.
analyzed: tattha nāma tva mogha purisa mayā virāgāya dhamme desite sa rāgāya cetessasi visaññogāya dhamme desite saññogāya cetessasi anupādānāya dhamme desite sa upādānāya cetessasi

original: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena rāgavirāgāya dhammo desito, madanimmadanāya
analyzed: nanu mayā mogha purisa aneka pariyāyena rāga virāgāya dhammaḥ desitaḥ mada nimmadanāya

original: pipāsavinayāya ālayasamugghātāya vaṭṭupacchedāya taṇhākkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya
analyzed: pipāsā vinayāya ālaya samugghātāya vaṭṭu upacchedāya taṇhā kkhayāya virāgāya nirodhāya

original: Nanu mayā, moghapurisa, anekapariyāyena kāmānaṁ pahānaṁ akkhātaṁ, kāmasaññānaṁ pariññā
analyzed: nanu mayā moghapurisa aneka pariyāyena kāmānam pahānam akkhāta kāma saññānam pariññā

original: akkhātā, kāmapipāsānaṁ paṭivinayo akkhāto, kāmavitakkānaṁ samugghāto akkhāto, kāmapariḷāhānaṁ vūpasamo akkhāto?
analyzed: akkhātā kāma pipāsānam paṭivinayaḥ akkhātaḥ kāma vitakkānam samugghātaḥ akkhātaḥ kāma pariḷāhānam vūpasamaḥ akkhātaḥ

original: Netaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānaṁ vā pasādāya, pasannānaṁ vā bhiyyobhāvāya.
analyzed: neta mogha purisa appasannānam vā pasādāya pasannānam vā bhiyyobhāvāya

original: Atha khvetaṁ, moghapurisa, appasannānañceva appasādāya, pasannānañca ekaccānaṁ aññathattāyā”ti.
analyzed: atha khveta moghapurisa appasannānam ca iva appasādāya pasannānam ca ekaccānam aññathattāya ati

original: Atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṁ seyyasakaṁ anekapariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya …pe…
analyzed: atha khalu bhagavān āyasmantam seyyasakam aneka pariyāyena vigarahitvā dubbharatāya pe

original: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha
sañcetanikā sukka vissaṭṭhi saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti

original: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhūnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
analyzed: evañca idam bhagavatā bhikkhūnam sikkhāpadam paññattam hoti

original: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇītabhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭhassatī asampajānā niddaṁ okkamanti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū paṇīta bhojanāni bhuñjitvā muṭṭha satī asampajānāḥ niddam okkamanti

original: Tesaṁ muṭṭhassatīnaṁ asampajānānaṁ niddaṁ okkamantānaṁ supinantena asuci muccati.
analyzed: tesam muṭṭhassatīnam a sampajānānam niddam okkamantānam supinantena asuci muccati
sañcetanikā sukka vissaṭṭhi saṅgha ādisesaḥ ti
amhākam ca supin antena asuci muccati

original: Kacci nu kho mayaṁ saṅghādisesaṁ āpattiṁ āpannā”ti?
analyzed: kacci nu khalu mayam saṅgha ādisesam āpattim āpannā ati

original: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddiseyyātha—
analyzed: evam ca pana bhikkhave imam sikkhāpadam uddiseyyātha
sañcetanikā sukka vissaṭṭhi aññatra supi na antā saṅgha ādi sesaḥ ti
jānantaḥ sañjānantaḥ ced ca abhivitaritvā vītikkamaḥ

original: nīlaṁ pītakaṁ lohitakaṁ odātaṁ takkavaṇṇaṁ dakavaṇṇaṁ telavaṇṇaṁ khīravaṇṇaṁ dadhivaṇṇaṁ sappivaṇṇaṁ.
analyzed: nīlam pītakam lohitakam odātam takka vaṇṇam daka vaṇṇam tela vaṇṇam khīra vaṇṇam dadhi vaṇṇam sappi vaṇṇa

original: saṅghova tassā āpattiyā parivāsaṁ deti, mūlāya paṭikassati, mānattaṁ deti, abbheti; na sambahulā, na ekapuggalo. Tena vuccati—“saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: saṅghaḥ uva tassā āpattiyā parivāsam deti mūlāya paṭikassati mānattam deti abbheti na sambahulāḥ na eka puggalo tena vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti

original: Tasseva āpattinikāyassa nāmakammaṁ adhivacanaṁ. Tenapi vuccati—“saṅghādiseso”ti.
analyzed: tassa eva āpatti nikāyassa nāma kammaṃ tena api vuccati saṅgha ādiseso ti
uccā āliṅga pāṇaka daṭṭhū upatthambhe moca iti
bahiddhā upādinne vā an upādinne vā
ākāse vāyamantassa aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti
rāgena pīḷitassa aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti
vaccena pīḷitassa aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti
passāvena pīḷitassa aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti
vātena pīḷitassa aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti
uccā āliṅga pāṇaka daṭṭhū upatthambha iti
uccā āliṅga pāṇaka daṭṭhena aṅga jātam kammaniyam hoti

original: nīlaṁ bhavissati, pītakaṁ bhavissati, lohitakaṁ bhavissati, odātaṁ bhavissati, takkavaṇṇaṁ
analyzed: nīlam bhavissati pītakam bhavissati lohitakam bhavissati odātam bhavissati takkavaṇṇa

original: bhavissati, dakavaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, telavaṇṇaṁ bhavissati, khīravaṇṇaṁ bhavissati,
analyzed: bhavissati daka vaṇṇam bhavissati tela vaṇṇam bhavissati khīra vaṇṇam bhavissati
dadhi vaṇṇam bhavissati sappi vaṇṇam bhavissati iti

original: Ajjhattarūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati, āpatti saṅghādisesassa.
analyzed: ajjhatta rūpe ceteti upakkamati muccati āpatti saṅgha ādisesassa
